extension.summary: XOT-Uzg.v3 is a plugin/script that allows the playback of a lot of TV shows that are available (legally) via the broadcasters websites.
extension.description: XOT-Uzg.v3 uses the official websites of a lot of different broadcasting companies (mainly Dutch, Belgian, British and Swedish) to make their re-run episodes available on the XBMC platform. More information can be found at www.rieter.net.[CR][CR]XOT-Uzg.v3 reports back usage statistics to our servers. This option can be disabled from the add-on settings.
extension.disclaimer: XOT-Uzg.v3 is provided as is. We do not take any responsibility for possible (but highly unlikely) damage cause to your system. Nor do we take responsibility for the content that can be watched via this add-on.
